fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You have the ability of every Town Investigative role (except this one) in <#970046125065265202> and can multitask.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The number of votes you have is the same as the number of Town Investigative roles in <#970046125065265202>.
- If you would otherwise die, instead a random Town Investigative part of you dies, and you lose that vote. Yes, the host has to keep track of this. If you somehow run out of Town Investigative roles, you actually die.
